forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely between 8am and 11am, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
